TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract MetadataItem extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the base item class for all the metadata in the [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/add/includes/vstecado-md.md)] metadata type hierarchy.
Gets the built-in type kind for this type.
Docs.value: A object that represents the built-in type kind for this type.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the documentation associated with this type.
Docs.value: A object that represents the documentation on this type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property allows you to get and set the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.Documentation> object that represents the documentation associated with conceptual model constructs such as the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer>, the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType>, the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ComplexType>, the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.AssociationType>, and so on. You can define the documentation tag in the conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) files and store schema definition language (SSDL) files. For more information, see [Documentation Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d49e7bb9-a6a1-4017-9c7e-7836bf3bef48).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType GetBuiltInType(valuetype System.Data.Metadata.Edm.BuiltInTypeKind builtInTypeKind) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a conceptual model built-in type that matches one of the values.
Docs.returns: An object that represents the built-in type in the EDM.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.FacetDescription> GetGeneralFacetDescriptions() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the list of the general facet descriptions for a specified type.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> object that represents the list of the general facet descriptions for a specified type.

Docs.summary: Gets the list of properties of the current type.
Docs.value: A collection of type <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection%601> that contains the list of properties of the current type.
